roleset.name: surgically create canals in again, or re-opening canals

example.name: recanalize-v
example.text: In 1964 he recanalized the femoral artery of an 83 year old woman with the combination of a guide wire and a catheter.
example.arg: the femoral artery of an 83 year old woman
with the combination of a guide wire and a catheter

example.name: recanalization-n
example.text: Percutaneous recanalization of chronically occluded coronary arteries:
